mapper.insert: INSERT INTO career (CAREER_ID, USER_ID, COMPANY_NAME, STATUS, POSITION, START_DATE, END_DATE, CERTIFICATION_URL, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{CAREER_ID}, #{USER_ID}, #{COMPANY_NAME}, #{STATUS}, {POSITION}, #{START_DATE}, #{END_DATE}, #{CERTIFICATION_URL}, #{CREATED_AT}, #{UPDATED_AT})
